title.rendered: RPA in healthcare: a crucial step towards intelligent automation

<title>RPA in Healthcare: A Path to Intelligent Automation — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Today, the applications of RPA in healthcare range from bot-assisted claims administration to compliance management. While medical RPA solutions do have their benefits, healthcare providers should treat RPA as a means to an end, eyeing AI-driven automation opportunities." />
